com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class XmlSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.XmlSigner

  • public class XmlSigner
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses the java XML Digital Signature API to generate an enveloped XML signature. Based on sample code at http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/technotes/guides/security/xmldsig/XMLDigitalSignature.html

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a new XmlSigner using the given public/private KeyPair.

      Creates a new XmlSigner by loading a keystore at the given location.
      static XmlSigner newInstanceWithRandomKeyPair()
      Most useful for testing.
      void sign(org.xml.sax.InputSource is, java.io.Writer writer)
      Signs the given XML document, writing the output to the given writer.
      void sign(java.io.Reader reader, java.io.Writer writer)
      Signs the given XML document, writing the output to the given writer.

      Signs the given XML document, provided as a string.

        Creates a new XmlSigner using the given public/private KeyPair.
        Parameters:
        keyPair - the keys for the signer
        Returns:
        the signer

      • newInstanceFromKeyStore

        public static XmlSigner newInstanceFromKeyStore(java.io.File file,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String certificatAlias)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new XmlSigner by loading a keystore at the given location.
        Parameters:
        file - the location of the JKS keystore file
        password - the password to access the keystore
        certificatAlias - the alias of the keys
        Returns:
        the signer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error loading the keys

      • newInstanceWithRandomKeyPair

        public static XmlSigner newInstanceWithRandomKeyPair()
        Most useful for testing.
        Returns:
        a new signer with a randomly generated DSA key pair

      • sign

        public java.lang.String sign(java.lang.String str)
                      throws org.xml.sax.SAXParseException
        Signs the given XML document, provided as a string.
        Parameters:
        str - the XML document to sign, as a string
        Returns:
        the signed XML document, again as a string
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXParseException - on error parsing the document

      • sign

        public void sign(java.io.Reader reader,
        java.io.Writer writer)
          throws org.xml.sax.SAXParseException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Signs the given XML document, writing the output to the given writer.
        Parameters:
        reader - the XML document to sign
        writer - to write the signed XML output
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXParseException - on error parsing the document
        java.io.IOException - on error writing to writer
